1.name: The Thief of Bagdad
1.description: A recalcitrant thief vies with a duplicitous Mongol ruler for the hand of a beautiful princess.

2.name: Sherlock Jr.
2.description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

3.name: Greed
3.description: The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.

4.name: Der letzte Mann
4.description: An aging doorman, after being fired from his prestigious job at a luxurious Hotel is forced to face the scorn of his friends, neighbours and society.

5.name: Die Nibelungen: Siegfried
5.description: Siegfried, son of King Sigmund, hears of the beautiful sister of Gunter, King of Worms, Kriemhild. On his way to Worms, he kills a dragon and finds a treasure, the Hort. He helps Gunther to...                See full summary »

6.name: The Iron Horse
6.description: After witnessing the murder of his father by a renegade as a boy, the grown-up Brandon helps to realize his father's dream of a transcontinental railway.

7.name: He Who Gets Slapped
7.description: A bitter clown endeavors to rescue the young woman he loves from the lecherous count who once betrayed him.

8.name: Die Nibelungen: Kriemhilds Rache
8.description: After Siegfried's dead, Kriemhild marries Etzel, the King of the Huns. She gives birth to a child, and invites her brothers for a party. She tries to persuade Etzel and the other Huns, that...                See full summary »

9.name: Aelita

10.name: Peter Pan
10.description: Peter Pan enters the nursery of the Darling children and, with the help of fairy dust, leads them off to Never Never Land, where they meet the nefarious Captain Hook.

11.name: Gösta Berlings saga
11.description: A drunkard priest who has been cast out by his community struggles to atone and regain his honour and dignity.

12.name: The Navigator
12.description: Two spoiled rich people find themselves trapped on an empty passenger ship.

13.name: Die Stadt ohne Juden
13.description: Jews are expelled from the city of Utopia.

15.name: Michael
15.description: Triangle story: painter, his young male model, unscrupulous princess.

16.name: The Marriage Circle
16.description: Professor Stock and his wife Mizzi are always bickering. Mizzi tries to seduce Dr. Franz Braun, the new husband of her good friend Charlotte. Dr. Braun's colleague, Dr. Mueller, who has had...                See full summary »

17.name: Romola
17.description: In Renaissance Florence, Tito, a no-good young man pretending to be a scholar, wins the admiration of a blind man who has long looked for someone to finish his scholarly work. He has a ...                See full summary »

18.name: Das Wachsfigurenkabinett
18.description: A wax museum hires a writer to give the sculptures stories. The writer imagines himself and the museum owner's daughter in the stories.

19.name: Manhandled

20.name: Orlacs Hände
20.description: A world-famous pianist loses both hands in an accident. When new hands are grafted on, he doesn't know they once belonged to a murderer.

22.name: The Humming Bird
22.description: A pickpocket (Swanson) falls in love with a newspaperman. When he is sent off to war and she disguises herself as a boy, joins a gang and sets out to save him.

23.name: America
23.description: The story of a family caught up in the American Revolutionary War.

26.name: L'inhumaine

27.name: Girl Shy
27.description: A shy, young man, who is completely incapable of talking to women, decides to write a book that details to other bachelors how to find a girlfriend.

30.name: Wild Oranges

33.name: Quo Vadis?
33.description: Watch the Apostles and other followers like Saul preach the gospel and spread the message of love and hope in this high quality entertaining animated feature for your kids and family.

34.name: The Sea Hawk
34.description: A wrongly convicted English gentleman goes from galley slave to pirate captain.

37.name: Captain Blood
37.description: Peter Blood, a young Irish physician, treats a rebel soldier wounded in battle, and he is arrested, tried for treason and sent into slavery to Barbados. He and his friend Jeremy are bought ...                See full summary »

38.name: Die Finanzen des Großherzogs
38.description: The likeable and carefree Grand Duke of Abacco is in dire straits. There is no money left to service the State's debt; the main creditor is looking forward to expropriating the entire Duchy...                See full summary »

39.name: Helena
39.description: Helena is a 1924 German silent drama film directed by Manfred Noa and starring Edy Darclea, Vladimir Gajdarov and Albert Steinrück.

41.name: Her Night of Romance
41.description: An impoverished British lord (Paul Menford) impersonates a doctor in order to woo an ailing American heiress (Dorothy Adams). The lord is in it for love, but his business associate (Joe Diamond) smells money.

42.name: A Sainted Devil
42.description: A nobleman seeks to rescue his bride, who has been kidnapped by his former lover and a bandit.

43.name: The Signal Tower
43.description: A railroad worker accepts a colleague's offer to stay in his home, but when his friend is called out one night to stop a runaway train, he makes a play for the man's wife.

44.name: La voyante
44.description: Jean is thrown out of the house by his father, a remarried politician, out of jealousy for his friendship with his mother-in-law. He finds refuge at an artist's apartment. In the same ...                See full summary »

46.name: Isn't Life Wonderful
46.description: A family of Polish refugees tries to survive in post-World War I Germany. For a while it seems that they are making it, but soon the economic and political deterioration in the country begins to take their toll.

47.name: Papirosnitsa ot Mosselproma
47.description: As she works in her tedious office job, Maria Ivanovna dreams about being married, and she has particular hopes that her co-worker Nikodim Mityushin will take an interest in her. Nikodim, ...                See full summary »

48.name: The Age of Innocence
48.description: Newland Archer is engaged to May Mingott of a prominent New York family. Shortly after the engagement is announce, Newland finds himself attracted to May's older married cousin Countess Ellen Olenska.

49.name: The White Shadow
49.description: In Paris a wild girl becomes possessed by the soul of her twin who died to save her life.
